msg: remove html tags from activity title (not allowed) and make activity id a valid url

author: chabotc
msg: Doh, offset by one mistake in the paging link & title, plus it seems createTextNode already does html escaping by it's self

author: chabotc
msg: Code cleanup of the OutputAtomConverter, it's much easier to read now and all the Atom output validates with http://validator.w3.org/feed/

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-713: FileProducer had faulty code that would consume the file if it was a out capable exchange. Introduced new header FileComponent.HEADER_FILE_NAME_PRODUCED containing the absolute filepath for the file produced.
